glossentry.glossdef: An optional component of the DAP that provides an AHB interface to a SoC.CoreSight supports access to a system bus infrastructure using the AHB Access Port (AHB-AP) in the Debug Access Port (DAP). The AHB-AP provides an AHB master port for direct access to system memory. Other bus protocols can use AHB bridges to map transactions. For example, you can use AHB to AXI bridges to provide AHB access to an AXI bus matrix.See Also Debug Access Port (DAP).
